pages.text: Terra Moss is one of the most commonly available magical herbs, it is simply that few recognise its potential. You can grow it by obtaining Terra Moss Spores from broken tall grass, $(info) and then imbue it into cobblestone $(warning) horizontally adjacent to water.

Once imbued into cobblestone that is adjacent to water, it will appear like any other mossy stone. Carefully scraping with a knife will give you Terra Moss, and indeed, this process can be performed even on mossy stones not imbued by you.

pages.name: Terra Moss
pages.text: Scraping a number of other mossy blocks with a knife will also give you terra moss.$(br2)$(info) These other blocks can also be imbued as can cobblestone.
